title: Inline React thumbs icons updated to match uploaded SVGs

requirements.summary: Update ThumbsUpIcon to render the exact uploaded thumb-up.svg markup while preserving className styling support.
acceptanceCriteria: `ThumbsUpIcon` renders the same shape/design as `thumb-up.svg` (not the current placeholder strokes).
`ThumbsUpIcon` still accepts `className` and applies it to the root `<svg>` element (or equivalent wrapper) so sizing/color can be controlled by existing Tailwind classes.

file_operations.description: Replace the placeholder inline SVG paths with the exact SVG markup from the user-uploaded `thumb-up.svg`, ensuring the root <svg> preserves `className={className}` and uses currentColor-compatible styling as needed.

requirements.summary: Update ThumbsDownIcon to render the exact uploaded thumb-down.svg markup while preserving className styling support.
acceptanceCriteria: `ThumbsDownIcon` renders the same shape/design as `thumb-down.svg` (not the current placeholder strokes).
`ThumbsDownIcon` still accepts `className` and applies it to the root `<svg>` element (or equivalent wrapper) so sizing/color can be controlled by existing Tailwind classes.

file_operations.description: Replace the placeholder inline SVG paths with the exact SVG markup from the user-uploaded `thumb-down.svg`, ensuring the root <svg> preserves `className={className}` and uses currentColor-compatible styling as needed.

requirements.summary: Ensure Today and History/Journal UI consistently render thumbs using the updated inline SVG icon components (no older SVGs or image asset fallbacks).
acceptanceCriteria: Today screen thumb UI renders using `ThumbsUpIcon`/`ThumbsDownIcon` and visually matches the uploaded SVG designs.
History/Journal thumb outcome icons render using `ThumbsUpIcon`/`ThumbsDownIcon` and visually match the uploaded SVG designs.

file_operations.description: Verify the Today screen thumb UI uses only `ThumbsUpIcon`/`ThumbsDownIcon` for all thumb renders and remove/avoid any fallback to older/generated thumb SVG markup or image paths.
Verify the History/Journal UI uses only `ThumbsUpIcon`/`ThumbsDownIcon` for all outcome icons and remove/avoid any fallback to older/generated thumb SVG markup or image paths.
Confirm the icons barrel exports continue to point to the updated `ThumbsUpIcon` and `ThumbsDownIcon` components so all imports resolve to the updated inline SVG implementations.
